subject: Interview Invitation for UX Designer Role at NovaSpire Inc
body:
Hi Emily,

We were thrilled to see your portfolio and experience in user experience design. We would like to invite you to participate in an interview for the UX Designer position at NovaSpire Inc.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 20 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Rachel Lee, Design Team Lead, who will discuss the role and your qualifications further.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Julian Hall
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaSpire Inc
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
